full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/27/2023 9134 Cockatoo Avenue Fountain Valley, California U. S. A. October 29, 1976 Consulate General Consulate Section U. S. Embassy Taipei, Taiwan Republic of China Dear sir, This is to confirm that we will be responsible for both Mr. Lin-Shen Kang and Mrs. Hon-Kan Chen Kang's living expenses while they, my wife's parents, will reside in the U.S. as immigrants in the immediate future. We will assure you that both Mr. & Mrs. Kang will never become the economical burden for the public in the U.S. We both are the naturalized U.S. citizens (Certificate No: 9931742 and 9931741, respectively) at present. Currently I am a senior research scientist at ICL Scientific, Fountain Valley, California, with the annual income around U.S. $21,000. In addition, our saving of more than $20,000 in U.S. (please see attachment) will further substantiate our capability to provide the financial support for Mr. & Mrs. Kang's living in the States. If you have any further question, please feel free to contact us. Truly yours, Yung Hsin PAN, Ph.D. Kang Pan Chiou Chwen Kang PAN, B.S.
